title.rendered: New Logo and Name for British Caneoing

content.rendered: (Est. 2000, originally as Canoe England) “British Canoeing is the English home association of the British Canoe Union (BCU) & the membership body for canoeists, clubs, centres & associates within England. Working alongside the BCU & our stakeholders, we support & develop canoeing within England, in areas such as Participation, Facilities, Waterways & Environment, Coaching, Volunteers, Paddler Pathways, Competition and Membership Services. Currently we have 33,000 members, 420 affiliated clubs & 150 approved centres. In addition, we also liaise with a range of youth groups, armed services, higher & further education & outdoors providers.” [Ed.’s Note: They sure love their ampersands]
